description: Dashboard of Kubernetes / OpenShift volume information at cluster level as exported by Prometheus connected to Kubernetes / OpenShift.

panels.title: Infrastructure Namespace Volumes Full in Week Based on Daily Use Rate
User Namespace Volumes Full in Week Based on Daily Use Rate

targets.expr: count (max by (persistentvolumeclaim,namespace) (kubelet_volume_stats_used_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster"} ) and (max by (persistentvolumeclaim,namespace) (kubelet_volume_stats_used_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster"} )) / (max by (persistentvolumeclaim,namespace) (kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster"} )) >= ($pvc_percent_used_warning_threshold / 100)) or vector (0)

panels.title: Running PVCs Above % Used Warning Threshold
Infrastructure Namespace Volumes Full in Week Based on Daily Use Rate - Current
Infrastructure Namespace Volumes Full in Week Based on Daily Use Rate - Alert History
Infrastructure Namespace Volumes Full in Week Based on Daily Use Rate - Predicted Available Space History
User Namespace Volumes Full in Week Based on Daily Use Rate - Current
User Namespace Volumes Full in Week Based on Daily Use Rate - Alert History
User Namespace Volumes Full in Week Based on Daily Use Rate - Predicted Available Space History
Running PVCs Above % Used Warning Threshold Stats - Current
Running PVCs Above % Used Warning Threshold - History

links.title: OpenShift Container Storage (OCS) 3.11: Operations Guide: 10.1. Available Metrics for File Storage and Block Storage

targets.expr: (1-max by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) (kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{cluster=~"$cluster"} ) ) unless (max by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (kubelet_volume_stats_used_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster"} )) or ((max by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) (kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{cluster=~"$cluster"} ) ) and (max by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (kubelet_volume_stats_used_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster"} )))

panels.description: WARNING: Any PVCs that are not bound to a running pod will not show up in this state.
